item.title: A look at recent zoo attacks
item.description: A 17yearold schoolboy was killed by a white tiger allegedly after he fell into the enclosure of the animal at a Delhi zoo on Tuesday Heres a look at other animal attacks in zoos across the world
item.itunes:subtitle: A 17yearold schoolboy was killed by a white tiger allegedly after he fell into the enclosure of the animal at a Delhi zoo on Tuesday Heres a look at other animal attacks in zoos across the world
item.itunes:summary: A 17yearold schoolboy was killed by a white tiger allegedly after he fell into the enclosure of the animal at a Delhi zoo on Tuesday Heres a look at other animal attacks in zoos across the world

item.title: ChinaIndia standoff continues along LAC
item.description: Chumar sector in eastern Ladakh remained active with Chinese Peoples Liberation Army troops involved in tactical manoeuvre with the Indian Army to exercise dominance by transgressing the Line of Actual Control
item.itunes:subtitle: Chumar sector in eastern Ladakh remained active with Chinese Peoples Liberation Army troops involved in tactical manoeuvre with the Indian Army to exercise dominance by transgressing the Line of Actual Control
item.itunes:summary: Chumar sector in eastern Ladakh remained active with Chinese Peoples Liberation Army troops involved in tactical manoeuvre with the Indian Army to exercise dominance by transgressing the Line of Actual Control

item.title: Cleaning Ganga will take 18 yrs Centre tells SC
item.description: The Centre has identified 118 towns located in five Ganga river basin states to achieve total sanitation targets including waste water treatment and solid waste management as a part of its 18yearold plan to rejuvenate the holy river
item.itunes:subtitle: The Centre has identified 118 towns located in five Ganga river basin states to achieve total sanitation targets including waste water treatment and solid waste management as a part of its 18yearold plan to rejuvenate the holy river
item.itunes:summary: The Centre has identified 118 towns located in five Ganga river basin states to achieve total sanitation targets including waste water treatment and solid waste management as a part of its 18yearold plan to rejuvenate the holy river

item.title: Ajit Singh plays memorial politics to revive RLD
item.description: Ajit Singhs strategy at retaining the house is being cloaked in a flawed political strategy aimed at reviving his sagging political fortunes after his partys severe drubbing in the parliamentary elections
item.itunes:subtitle: Ajit Singhs strategy at retaining the house is being cloaked in a flawed political strategy aimed at reviving his sagging political fortunes after his partys severe drubbing in the parliamentary elections
item.itunes:summary: Ajit Singhs strategy at retaining the house is being cloaked in a flawed political strategy aimed at reviving his sagging political fortunes after his partys severe drubbing in the parliamentary elections

item.title: India China ignore UN climate change summit
item.description: Five years after over 150 heads of state cobbled up a rickety climate deal that fell through the oneday UN Climate Summit is another attempt of rich nations to push India and China to accept some strong measures to check global warming
item.itunes:subtitle: Five years after over 150 heads of state cobbled up a rickety climate deal that fell through the oneday UN Climate Summit is another attempt of rich nations to push India and China to accept some strong measures to check global warming
item.itunes:summary: Five years after over 150 heads of state cobbled up a rickety climate deal that fell through the oneday UN Climate Summit is another attempt of rich nations to push India and China to accept some strong measures to check global warming

item.title: PM Modi wants 2 lakh MW more from sun wind with US help
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will seek US technology and investments for setting up 100000 MW each of solar and wind energy generation capacity in India over the next 10 years according to official documents in HTs possession
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will seek US technology and investments for setting up 100000 MW each of solar and wind energy generation capacity in India over the next 10 years according to official documents in HTs possession
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will seek US technology and investments for setting up 100000 MW each of solar and wind energy generation capacity in India over the next 10 years according to official documents in HTs possession

item.title: Govt removes 3 independent directors from ONGC board
item.description: The government has removed three independent directors appointed by the previous UPA regime from the board of Oil and Natural Gas Corp ONGC
item.itunes:subtitle: The government has removed three independent directors appointed by the previous UPA regime from the board of Oil and Natural Gas Corp ONGC
item.itunes:summary: The government has removed three independent directors appointed by the previous UPA regime from the board of Oil and Natural Gas Corp ONGC

item.title: Jharkhand to showcase Saranda liberation during Rajnath Singh visit
item.description: Jharkhand will showcase the liberation of Saranda as its biggest success story in the fight against Maoists when Union home minister Rajnath Singh arrives on Tuesday in the state ravaged by decades of leftwing extremism LWE
item.itunes:subtitle: Jharkhand will showcase the liberation of Saranda as its biggest success story in the fight against Maoists when Union home minister Rajnath Singh arrives on Tuesday in the state ravaged by decades of leftwing extremism LWE
item.itunes:summary: Jharkhand will showcase the liberation of Saranda as its biggest success story in the fight against Maoists when Union home minister Rajnath Singh arrives on Tuesday in the state ravaged by decades of leftwing extremism LWE

item.title: Google India to launch mobile app development contest for PMO
item.description: Google India in collaboration with MyGov the citizen engagement platform of the government will be launching a nationwide contest to develop a mobile app for the Prime Ministers Office
item.itunes:subtitle: Google India in collaboration with MyGov the citizen engagement platform of the government will be launching a nationwide contest to develop a mobile app for the Prime Ministers Office
item.itunes:summary: Google India in collaboration with MyGov the citizen engagement platform of the government will be launching a nationwide contest to develop a mobile app for the Prime Ministers Office

item.title: Works worth Rs 12cr stolen from painter Ram Kumars house
item.description: The stolen canvases were part of his signature Sad Town series painted in 1956 a dark body of work depicting India in industrial transition with the countrys mega towns battling unemployment rising prices and migration from villages

item.title: SC fines Centre for harassing IAS officer
item.description: The Supreme Court has slapped a fine of Rs 5 lakh on the Centre and Uttar Pradesh government for harassing a senior IAS officer who along with eminent jurist Ram Jethmalani had moved the court for a probe into the question of black money stashed abroad

item.title: Sohrabuddin Shaikh encounter case Yet another exemption for Amit Shah
item.description: A special Central Bureau of Investigation court on Monday once again exempted Bharatiya Janata Party president Amit Shah from appearance in the alleged fake encounter case of Sohrabuddin Shaikh
item.itunes:subtitle: A special Central Bureau of Investigation court on Monday once again exempted Bharatiya Janata Party president Amit Shah from appearance in the alleged fake encounter case of Sohrabuddin Shaikh
item.itunes:summary: A special Central Bureau of Investigation court on Monday once again exempted Bharatiya Janata Party president Amit Shah from appearance in the alleged fake encounter case of Sohrabuddin Shaikh

item.title: Restore border fencing in JK Rajnath Singh
item.description: According to home ministry officials Singh on his first visit to the BSF headquarters assured the force all financial help in this regard The BSF submitted a proposal seeking funds to accomplish the task quickly
item.itunes:subtitle: According to home ministry officials Singh on his first visit to the BSF headquarters assured the force all financial help in this regard The BSF submitted a proposal seeking funds to accomplish the task quickly
item.itunes:summary: According to home ministry officials Singh on his first visit to the BSF headquarters assured the force all financial help in this regard The BSF submitted a proposal seeking funds to accomplish the task quickly

item.title: Congress slams Gujarat govt over faulty map
item.description: The Congress on Monday put the Gujarat government in a spot over the latters faulty map projecting Arunachal Pradesh and Jammu and Kashmir as disputed regions The alleged map was circulated on Sep 17 at the signing of a memorandum with China during President Xi Jinpings visit

item.title: Congress slams Gujarat govt over faulty map
item.description: The Congress Monday put the Gujarat government in a spot over the latters faulty map projecting Arunachal Pradesh and JK as disputed regions The alleged map was circulated on September 17 at the signing of a memorandum with China
